administrative.units.description: The platform allows you to create all levels of administration within your country. Adding an administrative unit here will make it available for users when registering on the platform and allow you to customise availability of content within these units.
administrative.units.locations.upload: We will now attempt to upload the locations. This may take a bit of time depending on the number of entries you have in your file. Please make sure you used the template provided to guarantee the success of this process.
administrative.units.remove.confirm: You are about to remove an administrative unit. This may have adverse effects in cases where content is tagged to this unit. Constraints restricting content and users within this unit will also be removed. Would you still like to proceed?
channel.description: The platform supports interaction in multiple channels. Adding a channel here will make it available for users within the platform. If you already had content in the system, it would be advisable to go back and update the content for this new channel for the benefit of your users.
channels.remove.confirm: You are about to remove a channel. This may have adverse effects in the case users access the platform through this channel. Content targeting this channel will also be removed. Would you still like to proceed?
channels.richtext.support: Does the channel support rich messages?
channels.toggle: This action will {status} this channel. Are you sure you want to continue?
constraints.description: Constraints allow you to specify availability of this question to users  who meet your desired criteria.
constraints.description.menu: Constraints allow you to specify availability of this menu node to users who meet your desired criteria.
content.page.description: Here is a list of content created for your users
content.page.title: Content library
general.app.name: FarmVibes.Bot
general.await.persist: Please wait as we save the entries you have made.
general.background.process: This is a long-running process, activity will be completed in the background.
general.confirm.proceed: Are you sure you want to continue?
general.form.file.uploadprompt: Click to upload or drag and drop a file here...
general.form.submit.error: An error occured while trying to save your record. Please try again later
general.form.submit.success: Your work was successfully saved. You can now close this panel
general.list.dbsearch: Hit enter to search entire database
general.list.selected: {count, plural, zero {No items selected} one {1 item selected} other {# items selected}}
general.name: Name
general.page.comingsoon.message: The requested page {pathname} is coming soon.
general.page.comingsoon.title: Coming soon.
general.page.notfound.message: The requested URL {pathname} was not found on this server.
general.page.notfound.title: 404, Page not found.
general.postfix.hint: If the channel requires all outgoing messages to be terminated by certain characters, please indicated here
general.prefix.hint: If the channel requires every outgoing message to be prefixed by certain characters, please define that here
general.publish.confirm: Are you sure you want to publish this {subject}?
general.remove.confirm: Are you sure you want to remove this item?
language.add.hint: Content in some languages can be auto-translated. If the language you is supported by the Microsoft Text Translation service, the iso code will be automatically provided otherwise you will have to manually enter code.
language.autotranslate.available: Your content will machine-translated automatically when added. Please make sure the translation is acceptable before saving.
language.autotranslate.unavailable: Automatic translation is not available for this language. Please make sure you provide text in this language otherwise the user will receive content in your default language if text is missing.
language.default.confirm: The platform treat this as the primary language each time you attempt to add text. Are you sure you want to proceed?
language.default.remove.allowed: You are about to remove a language. This may have adverse effects in the case users have this as their default language. Content in this language will also be removed. Would you still like to proceed?
language.default.remove.notallowed: Unfortunately you are not allowed to delete the default language. Please set another as default to be able to remove this language.
language.name.hint: Content in some languages can be auto-translated. If the language you is supported by the Microsoft Text Translation service, the iso code will be automatically provided otherwise you will have to manually enter code.
language.page.description: The platform supports interaction in multiple languages. Adding a language here will make it available for users within the platform. Content will automatically be translated in the background if the new language is available on Microsoft Translator API, otherwise, users will see content added in the default language.
menu.default.confirmation: This action will make this the main menu users get to see. Are you sure you want to proceed?
menu.default.delete.confirm: You are about to remove a navigation menu. If the menu is published, it will no-longer appear to it's relevant users. Branches and nodes associated with it will also be discarded. Would you still like to proceed?
menu.default.delete.deny: Unfortunately you are not allowed to delete the default menu. Please set another published menu as default to be able to remove this menu.
menu.default.publish.info: Publishing a menu makes it available to users of the platform on all designated channels.
menu.default.unpublish.warning: This navigation will no-longer be accessible to your platform users. {isDefaultWarning} Are you sure you want to continue?
menu.default.unpublishable.warning: {menu} is the default navigation path. You will have to select an active menu default once you complete this action.
menu.label: Menu label
menu.node.publish: Publishing this node would make it visible on the bot's menu. Do you want to proceed?
question: {count, plural, one {question} other {questions}}
question.form.label: Enter question
question.form.reference: What is the name or reference for your question?
service.delete.blocked: Unfortunately you cannot delete this service.
service.delete.confirm: You are about to remove a service. If the service is attached to a menu, it will no-longer appear to it's relevant users. All related questions, translations and other related configuration will be deleted. Would you still like to proceed?
service.form.conclusion.hint: The user will see this message when they conclude interaction with this service.
service.form.introduction.hint: Provide introductory message or guide for user when they begin interacting with the service.
service.interaction.after.completion: Allow user to go back to service after interaction?
service.interaction.limited: User limited to only one interaction?
service.publish: You are about to make this service invisible on all menus your users have access to.
service.unpublish: You are about to make this service available to your users. Please make sure all questions are published and all messages to your audience have are translated for a uniform user experience in all languages.
service.unpublishable: Sorry, this service cannot be unpublished.
user.remove.confirm: You are about to remove {fullname} from the platform. The user will not be able to access the platform again unless they register. Would you like to proceed?
validation.available: List of input validations available on the application
validation.intro.exists: The following {count} will be applied to verify every user response to this question
validation.intro.notexists: No validation specified for this question.
validation.prompt: Please specify how you want to verify response to this question.
